title: "Index"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
#| label: load-packages
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(tigris)

presidents <- read_csv("data/1976-2020-president.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)

```


```{r}
#| label: maps

usa_map <- states(cb = TRUE, year = 2022, progress_bar = FALSE)

presidents |>
  filter(year == 1976) |>
  group_by(state) |>
  filter(candidatevotes == max(candidatevotes)) |>
  left_join(usa_map, by = join_by("state_po" == "STUSPS")) |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(aes(geometry = geometry, fill = party_detailed)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("blue", "red")) +
  coord_sf(xlim = c(-180, -60), ylim = c(20, 70)) +
  theme_void() +
  labs(fill = "Political Party")

```
